name: Beat Master!
description: This game has no video and does not require any hand or finger movement. Move your body around to the beat! Move around to the beat and try to get points! The game's quality depends on your camera or webcam quality, phone or laptop camera will work! Be sure to allow the page to use the camera and turn the volume up. Created for the no video game jam. Used scratch, photoshop, and beepbox. If it does not run automatically, just click on it! Voices are done via Amazon's text to speech systems!
